Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ عِنْدَ إِضْمَارِ كُلِّ مُضْمِرٍ وَقَوْلِ كُلِّ قَائِلٍ وَعَمَلِ كُلِّ عَامِلٍ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, knows the hidden intention of every concealer, the speech of every speaker and the action of every doer

Wisdom: خَرَقَ عِلْمُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ بَاطِنَ غَيْبِ السُّتَرَاتِ وَأَحَاطَ بِغُمُوضِ عَقَائِدِ السَّرِيرَاتِ
enWisdom: The knowledge of Allah, the Glorified, tore through the veils of the unseen and encompassed the darkness of inner-beliefs

Wisdom: قَدْ أَحَاطَ عِلْمُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ بِالْبَوَاطِنِ وَأَحْصَى الظَّوَاهِرِ
enWisdom: The knowledge of Allah, the Glorified, encompasses the concealed interiors and records the apparent exteriors

Wisdom: قَدْ سَمَّى اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ آثَارَكُمْ وَعَلِمَ أَعْمَالَكُمْ وَكَتَبَ آجَالَكُمْ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has recorded your traces, known your actions and ordained your death
Every knower other than Allah is a learner
Every secret is manifest for Allah

Wisdom: كُلُّ بَاطِنٍ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ جَلَّتْ آلَاؤُهُ ظَاهِرٌ
enWisdom: Every hidden thing is apparent for Allah, exalted are His bounties

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَشُكُّ فِي قُدْرَةِ اللَّهِ وَهُوَ يَرَى خَلْقَهُ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who doubts in the power of Allah while he sees His creation!

Wisdom: كُلُّ قَوِيٍّ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ ضَعِيفٌ
enWisdom: Every strong other than Allah is a weak

Wisdom: كُلُّ قَادِرٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ مَقْدُورٌ
enWisdom: Every capable one other than Allah is unable
Everything is humble in front of Allah
Everything is submissive in front of Allah
Every victor other than Allah, is vanquished

Wisdom: تَعَالَى اللَّهُ مِنْ قَوِيٍّ مَا أَحْلَمَهُ وَتَوَاضَعْتَ مِنْ ضَعِيفٍ مَا أَجْرَأَكَ عَلَى مَعَاصِيهِ
enWisdom: The sweetness of sin is spoilt by the pain of retribution

Wisdom: السَّبَبُ الَّذِي أَدْرَكَ بِهِ الْعَاجِزُ بُغْيَتَهُ هُوَ الَّذِي أَعْجَزَ الْقَادِرَ عَنْ طَلِبَتِهِ
enWisdom: The means by which an incapable person achieves his goal is the same one (means) that makes the powerful person incapable to achieving what he seeks
